headline: Danaher appoints Martin Stumpe as chief technology and AI officer
summary: The company said Stumpe’s promotion is a “pivotal step in [its] digital transformation and its ambition to lead the next era of innovation in life sciences and diagnostics.”

raw.headline: Danaher appoints Martin Stumpe as chief technology and AI officer

headline: Danaher: Biotech Momentum, Cost Cuts And Valuation Re-Rating Should Drive Upside
summary: Danaher is positioned for a revenue rebound, led by strong bioprocessing demand and resilient recurring sales. Read why DHR stock is a Buy.
